General.Name: Power Wind Health Industry Incorporated
General.Description: Power Wind Health Industry Incorporated engages in the business of membership-based fitness center chains, recreational sports venues, and other sports services in Taiwan. It provides sports training and other services. Power Wind Health Industry Incorporated was founded in 1995 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4.Name: Mr. Wei Song He
4.Title: EVP - Fitness Factory Bus. Unit, VP - the Dept of Physical Fitness
